text: Nelson Nieves (25 December 1934 - 13 January 2021) was a Venezuelan fencer. He competed in the team foil events at the 1952 Summer Olympics. He was born in Caracas, Venezuela. Nieves died on 13 January 2021 in Caracas at the age of 86. ==References== Category:1934 births Category:2021 deaths Category:Fencers Category:Olympians for Venezuela Category:Sportspeople from Caracas
title: Nelson Nieves
